pageTitle: Is coronavirus (COVID-19) the main reason for your claim?

coronavirusReasonForClaim.label: Is coronavirus (COVID-19) the main reason for your claim?
coronavirusReasonForClaim.hint:
Select yes if one of the following applies to you or your child, now or some time in the past:

  • you’re self-isolating because you have symptoms of coronavirus
  • you’re self-isolating because you came into contact with someone who has symptoms of coronavirus. Or you were told to self-isolate by a test and trace service
  • you’ve been advised by your doctor or healthcare professional to self-isolate before going into hospital for surgery
  • you’re quarantining because you have returned from another country on the red or amber list (opens in new tab)

errors.required: Select yes if coronavirus is the main reason for your claim
